summary: Yesterday, we celebrated Midsummer here in Sweden.  Of all the holidays of the year, Midsummer is the one I like the most.  It's a beautiful time of the year, and it's something different when it's mostly celebrated outdoors (compared to, for example, Christmas and New Year)...
title: Swedish Midsummer

summary:
Following on from Martin’s post about, Tiny Things I Like, I thought to do my version and then I thought, why not go big, after all, I’m a BIG kinda Gal.  So here we go:
BIG Things I Like

Beds
Cups of tea
Breakfasts
Newspapers
Books
Couches

BIG things I don’t like

Crowds
Personalities
Egos
Cities
Airports
Events

And you, what tiny or BIG things do you like. 
#Life #Lists
title: BIG Things I Like
